title: PA-20-03: Initial Ethics Briefing for Senate-Confirmed Presidential Appointees
url: https://www.oge.gov/Web/oge.nsf/Legal Docs/9D3D4EFD1F6F4E28852585BA005BEC0F/$FILE/PA-20-03 Initial Ethics Briefing for Senate-Confirmed Presidential Appointees.pdf?open
summary: In light of the COVID-19 pandemic, this Program Advisory clarifies that OGE is not requiring or encouraging PAS officials to meet “in person” with a qualified ethics official to satisfy the regulatory requirement found in 5 C.F.R. § 2638.305 or the requirement in their ethics agreements.
